game.name: Train Simulator: DB BR143+760
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: ‘All the way there, and back’. A cab car (or control car, or driving trailer) transforms the operational capabilities of a loco-hauled passenger train by enabling it to behave like a multiple unit.
game.shortDescriptionEn: ‘All the way there, and back’. A cab car (or control car, or driving trailer) transforms the operational capabilities of a loco-hauled passenger train by enabling it to behave like a multiple unit.
